Name: American Pie Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Crème de Myrtille liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of float dehydrated apple slice.
Review: This berry and apple pie has a tangy bite.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in the noughties at Oxo Tower Restaurant & Bar, London, England and originally named American Pie Martini.
Nutrition: One serving of American Pie Cocktail contains 203 calories
